#DoYouFollow 19-year-old professional skateboarder Poppy Starr Olsen (@poppystarr)? She has been fearlessly conquering skate ramps, training for elite üõπ competitions and, most importantly, having fun on four wheels since the age of 8. ‚Å£
‚Å£
Check out some other superstars of the #skatergirl community on today‚Äôs story, and spend a day at the skate park with @poppystarr on today‚Äôs episode of #DoYouFollow, our series which dives deep into some of Instagram‚Äôs most popular interests and the people who make them awesome. üíõ‚Å£

Click on the link in our bio for the ‚ÄúThe A-Z of Instagram,‚Äù highlighting some of the top Instagram trends, plus emerging creators and interests in Australia right now. (Spoiler alert: Poppy is in the mix.)‚Å£

Home caf√© drinks creator Yeana Choi‚Äôs (@y.na__) beautiful beverages are inspired by color. ‚ÄúI choose the color scheme, then select the ingredients before I begin my work,‚Äù she says. Her creamy lattes and fruit-infused lemonades poured over frozen shapes have a carefully considered aesthetic, and music to match the mood. ‚ÄúI fundamentally consider beauty and taste when making my recipes,‚Äù she says.‚Å£

It's guaranteed to be a üåû day when you've found your way to @sesamestreet. Take it from Elmo, Bert and Ernie, Cookie Monster, Oscar the Grouch, Abby Cadabby and Grover as they join us for today's episode of #YouGotThis.‚Å£

This year, marks Sesame Street's 50th Anniversary, and in addition to celebrating with üéÇ and üéâ the gang is ready to share some of their top tried-and-true tips to make this week a great one. See it now on today's story.

A new team. A new season. A familiar city. Six-time All-Star point guard Kyrie Irving‚Äôs (@kyrieirving) basketball journey has come full circle, as he begins a new season playing for the team he cheered on as a four-year-old kid ‚Äî the @brooklynnets. Learn more about Kyrie‚Äôs path to the @nba and his life on and off the court on today‚Äôs episode of #ThreeMinuteAutobiography üî•

For @nba point guard Kyrie Irving (@kyrieirving), competing for the @brooklynnets is a childhood dream come true. The former first overall draft pick and six-time All-Star‚Äôs new home court is less than an hour from where he fell in love with üèÄ as a kid. ‚Å£

Learn more about Kyrie‚Äôs life on and off the court and his hopes for the new season on today‚Äôs #ThreeMinuteAutobiography, where some of your favorite ‚≠êÔ∏ès share their life story in just three minutes. Check it out right now on our IGTV.

‚ÄúWhen you try a trick or a jump thousands of times and you finally make it, it‚Äôs amazing,‚Äù says 16-year-old professional freerunner Lilou Ruel (@lilouruel). ‚ÄúBefore doing this sport, I looked at the landscape normally, like anyone on earth; Now it‚Äôs completely different. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm just a human being trying to have fun and spread love,‚Äù says 21-year-old musical artist and skater Roy Purdy (@roypurdy). ‚ÄúI film my videos in public to show it doesn‚Äôt matter where you are or who you‚Äôre surrounded by, you can let yourself be seen and act however you want. Don‚Äôt worry about what‚Äôs normal. Don‚Äôt worry about who‚Äôs watching and what they‚Äôre thinking. Just express yourself freely and openly. Go explore, go create.‚Äù‚Å£

‚ÄúSkateboarding has no rules; I like not having to skate a certain way. Everyone can do their own thing,‚Äù says UK-based Ellis Frost (@ellisfrost), who likes to have fun by incorporating unexpected tricks into his skateboarding.‚Å£

‚ÄúMy friends have been playing basketball a lot this year, and I‚Äôm not very good at it, so I wanted to try it my own way. My skateboard did not survive filming that video ‚Äî I had to get a new one the next day.‚Äù‚Å£

It‚Äôs Anti-Bullying Week in the UK, but no matter where in the üåé you live, everyone has a vital role in standing up to bullying. Choose kindness, spread love and live your truth. üåüüíï‚ú®‚Å£

Our friends @antibullyingpro and @dianaaward are working with some amazing anti-bullying ambassadors to share the creative ways they are taking a stand against bullying ‚Äî and encouraging others to do the same. Head over to our story to see them in action.‚Å£

If you or someone you know is experiencing bullying and needs support, click the link in our bio for helpful resources.
